## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT2G30240](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT2G30240)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATCHX13, CHX13</u>
- **Gene Name:** CATION/H+ EXCHANGER 13
- **Description:**   Cation/hydrogen exchanger family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2060827
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [atchx13-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Reduced rate of growth and increased leaf chlorosis. Pale leaves with reduced levels of chlorophyll.
